title: Large-Scale Workshop on Designing Learning Integration Development Practices in Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in organizational project management and workflow design, with foundational understanding of adult learning theory
context.additional_context: Scenario-based learning conducted for organizational development practitioners in science fields, mirroring real workplace environments.

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to design learning-integrated development frameworks by analyzing organizational safety practices

Analyze three workplace-based PBL (Project-Based Learning) cases, propose two actionable strategies for organizational efficiency improvement, and explain expected effects using quantitative metrics (e.g., 15% time reduction, 10% cost decrease)
Use a science career competency diagnostic checklist to identify three strengths and two development areas, then create a 3-month actionable career development plan
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
